title: Nerf stronger champions...
body:
Looking over a lot of the previous patch notes specifically on champions, I've noticed that the nerfs were mostly on already weak and underplayed champions. This is causing really op champions to just dominate without having to do much because they haven't been nerfed lately or just had a tiny nerf. A good example of this is Udyr. Udyr has grown in the new jungle to be a really tanky, fast clearing, game carrying, annoying as heck champion. All he does late game is split push and run back and forth to just stall. If you're alone you deal no damage to him but he does way too much back because he is really tanky yet just attack speed is good enough because his kit is way too simple yet op. In other words; {{champion:77}} ={{item:3070}} for his opponents. He is like a tanky melee version of Sona just heaps stronger in any situation.

Please look over this and maybe fix? 

Anyways thanks for reading, From xXFR33D0MXx
